raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

1. Synthetic peptide, designated EPPT1 (YCAREPPTRTFAYWG; SEQ ID NO: 11), has been developed as specific ligands and has shown significant affinity (Kd=20 μM).
2. The conformationally restrained RGD sequence, i.e. cyclic RGD, contains disulfide bridges and binds to αVβ3 20-40 fold more avidly than linear RGD peptides (Koivunen, E., Wang, B. & Ruoslahti, E., Biotechnology (N.Y.), 13: 265-270 (1995)) with a binding affinity of (Kd not explicitly stated but implied to be in the range of 20-40 fold more avidly than linear RGD peptides).
3. Cellular uptake of folates is facilitated by either a low affinity reduced folate carrier (Km˜1 μM), which is present in virtually all cells of the body, or a high affinity glycosylphosphatidylinositol- linked folate receptor (FR) (KD=˜100 pM), which exhibits highly limited distribution.

Note that sentence 2 does not explicitly state the Kd value, but it implies a comparison with linear RGD peptides. If you want to exclude this sentence, the revised list would be:

1. Synthetic peptide, designated EPPT1 (YCAREPPTRTFAYWG; SEQ ID NO: 11), has been developed as specific ligands and has shown significant affinity (Kd=20 μM).
2. Cellular uptake of folates is facilitated by either a low affinity reduced folate carrier (Km˜1 μM), which is present in virtually all cells of the body, or a high affinity glycosylphosphatidylinositol- linked folate receptor (FR) (KD=˜100 pM), which exhibits highly limited distribution.
